titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd August the 4th 1700. On Psalm cxlvi. vers. 3, 4, 5 ... / by W. Fleetwood ...
titleStmt.author: Fleetwood, William, 1656-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Henry Hills ...

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained, with some loss of text.
Written on the death of the Duke of Gloucester.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
